body_html:
Thanks for your contribution @pkit your patch looks really useful. Would you like to upstream this into TF itself?
I think the comment above is more about the dependency of TF at build time on CUDA. @r4nt it is possible that the patch by @pkit will tackle that problem. If cuda is only loaded when needed, our build system may avoid depending on it.

body:
Thanks for your contribution @pkit your patch looks really useful. Would you like to upstream this into TF itself?
I think the comment above is more about the dependency of TF at build time on CUDA. @r4nt it is possible that the patch by @pkit will tackle that problem. If cuda is only loaded when needed, our build system may avoid depending on it.
